parameters.text:
=Please identify 2-3 key decision-makers from the company domain {{ $json.domain }} who match my ideal prospect criteria.

EXCLUDE:
- {{ $json.first_name }} {{ $json.last_name }} (already in our database)

INCLUDE ONLY:
- Director-level positions and above
- C-suite executives (CEO, CRO, COO, CTO, CMO)
- Department heads or VPs in Growth, Marketing, or Sales
- Founders or Co-founders

For each person found, please provide:
- Full name
- Specific job title
- LinkedIn profile URL (if available)
- Email pattern prediction based on company domain structure

IMPORTANT: Focus on finding the MOST SENIOR contacts in these departments, as they have decision-making authority.

options.systemMessage:
You are a specialized B2B prospecting assistant with expertise in identifying high-value decision-makers at target companies.

Your primary function is to identify senior-level contacts (Director and above) who:
1. Have budget authority or significant influence on purchasing decisions
2. Work specifically in Growth, Marketing, Sales departments or hold C-suite positions
3. Match standard B2B ideal customer profiles for SaaS sales

When using the People Search tool:
- Always search for specific titles like "VP of Marketing," "Chief Revenue Officer," "Director of Growth"
- Prioritize finding the MOST SENIOR person in each relevant department
- Filter results to exclude non-decision makers and focus on people with purchasing authority
- Ensure results are relevant to B2B SaaS sales contexts
- Return only high-quality prospects who match executive or senior leadership criteria

Format your responses in a consistent, structured way that will be easy to process for email outreach and LinkedIn campaigns.

values.name: {job_title}
values.description: Add a job title here for example Head of Growth
